thread.title: ‘Coward move’ by Boone? Tomsula saw play differently than Giants’ Beason
thread.title_full: ‘Coward move’ by Boone? Tomsula saw play differently than Giants’ Beason - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Eric Branch
title: ‘Coward move’ by Boone? Tomsula saw play differently than Giants’ Beason
text: Giants linebacker Jon Beason claimed he sustained a concussion in last week’s 30-27 win over the 49ers was the result of a “coward move” by left guard Alex Boone.
